meanings.sent1: The angry waves wampishing against the shore sounded like thunder.
meanings.sent2: She wampished the rug to get rid of the dust.
meanings.sent3: The chef wampished the eggs in the pan, creating a fluffy omelette.
meanings.sent4: The wind wampishing through the trees made them sway wildly.
meanings.sent5: The boxer wampishing his opponent with powerful punches.

meanings.sent1: The wampishing of the drums echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The poor dog received a wampishing from the bigger dog.
meanings.sent3: The wampishing of the rain on the roof made it hard to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The wampishing of the waterfall created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The wampishing of the waves against the rocks was deafening.
